commit.message:
c-common.c (build_common_tree_nodes): Build intTI_type_nodes for HOST_BITS_PER_WIDE_INT == 32 too.

	* c-common.c (build_common_tree_nodes): Build intTI_type_nodes
	for HOST_BITS_PER_WIDE_INT == 32 too.
